english.segment1: I've been bruised and I've been broken. Can't believe that I put up with all this pain. I've been used and I was choking on the promise. I would never fall again
english.segment2: I used to sing to your twisted symphony. The words that had me trapped inside your misery. But now I know the reason why I couldn't breathe
english.segment3: 'Cause all I want is everything you're not. So go ahead and slam the door 'cause you can't shut me out. No, I don't, don't care what you say. 'Cause all I really, all I really want is everything you're not
english.segment4: Never gonna break my heart again. Never gonna see your face again. Never wanna feel this way again
english.segment5: Your darkness was my weakness. But it turns out that it only went so deep, deep. A meaningless diversion. That is all that you ever meant to me, me, me, me
english.segment6: And I am done with your twisted symphony. The words that had me sound like stolen poetry. I tore the pages and I can finally breathe
english.segment7: 'Cause all I want is everything you're not. So go ahead and slam the door 'cause you can't shut me out. No, I don't, don't care what you say. 'Cause all I really, all I really want is everything you're not
english.segment8: Never gonna break my heart again. Never gonna see your face again
english.segment9: I want a gentleman who treats me like a queen. I need respect, I need love, nothing in between. I will not spell it out for you if you can't see. 'Cause you're not worthy, you don't deserve me and now I'm gone
english.segment10: Everything you're not, not, not. Everything you're not, not, not. One, two, three
english.segment11: 'Cause all I want is everything you're not. So go ahead and slam the door 'cause you can't shut me out. No, I don't, don't care what you say. All I really, all I really want is everything you're not
english.segment12: Never gonna break my heart again. Never gonna see your face again. Never wanna feel this way again
english.segment13: Never gonna break my heart again. Never gonna see your face again. Never wanna feel this way again
english.segment14: Never gonna break my heart again. Never gonna see your face again. Never wanna feel this way again
